    RunEnrichr

    RunEnrichr.Rd

    Run Enrichr gene set enrichment tests on hdWGCNA modules

    RunEnrichr(
  seurat_obj,
  dbs = c("GO_Biological_Process_2021", "GO_Cellular_Component_2021",
    "GO_Molecular_Function_2021"),
  max_genes = 100,
  wgcna_name = NULL,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    seurat_obj

    A Seurat object

    dbs

    character vector of EnrichR databases

    max_genes

    Max number of genes to include per module, ranked by kME.

    wgcna_name

    The name of the hdWGCNA experiment in the seurat_obj@misc slot

    Examples

    RunEnrichr
#> function (seurat_obj, dbs = c("GO_Biological_Process_2021", "GO_Cellular_Component_2021", 
#>     "GO_Molecular_Function_2021"), max_genes = 100, wgcna_name = NULL, 
#>     ...) 
#> {
#>     if (is.null(wgcna_name)) {
#>         wgcna_name <- seurat_obj@misc$active_wgcna
#>     }
#>     modules <- GetModules(seurat_obj, wgcna_name)
#>     mods <- levels(modules$module)
#>     mods <- mods[mods != "grey"]
#>     combined_output <- data.frame()
#>     for (i in 1:length(mods)) {
#>         cur_mod <- mods[i]
#>         cur_info <- subset(modules, module == cur_mod)
#>         cur_info <- cur_info[, c("gene_name", paste0("kME_", 
#>             cur_mod))]
#>         cur_genes <- top_n(cur_info, max_genes) %>% .$gene_name %>% 
#>             as.character
#>         enriched <- enrichR::enrichr(cur_genes, dbs)
#>         for (db in names(enriched)) {
#>             cur_df <- enriched[[db]]
#>             if (nrow(cur_df) > 1) {
#>                 cur_df$db <- db
#>                 cur_df$module <- cur_mod
#>                 combined_output <- rbind(combined_output, cur_df)
#>             }
#>         }
#>     }
#>     seurat_obj <- SetEnrichrTable(seurat_obj, combined_output, 
#>         wgcna_name)
#>     seurat_obj
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x7fdb2c151d60>
#> <environment: namespace:hdWGCNA>
